name: TefalSmarthome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the vacuum cleaner”
”Alexa, stop the vacuum cleaner”
”Alexa, set air purifier on autoday mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
In order to be able to use "Tefal Smarthome" you must first connect your robot with the Tefal Robots app or your purifiers with Pure Air By Tefal app.

You must then in Amazon Alexa log in with the same account than in "Tefal Smarthome" in order to be able to control your products by voice.

Here are some of the phrases you can use to control your products:

ROBOTS 
• “Alexa, turn on the vacuum cleaner. "
• “Alexa, stop the vacuum cleaner. "
• "Alexa, activate charge mode the vacuum cleaner."
• "Alexa, activate charge mode the vacuum cleaner."
• "Alexa, activate wall follow mode on Bob."
• "Alexa, set boost power mode on Bob."

AIR PURIFIERS
• “Alexa, switch on air purifier."
• “Alexa, switch off air purifier."
• “Alexa, set air purifier on [autoday, auto night, manuel] mode."
• “Alexa, set air purifier speed on [1 to 10]."
